text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode where concept is-a _AdministrativeContactRoleType

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _AdministrativeContactRoleTypeAdministrativeContactRoleTypeA contact role used for business and/or administrative purposes.

name: AdministrativeContactRoleType
title: AdministrativeContactRoleType
description: A role type that is used to further qualify an entity playing a role where the role class attribute is set to RoleClassCommissioningParty.
